title: AWS IoT Core - Implementing Publisher and Subscriber for MQTT in Python
metaText: Explore how to implement a robust MQTT publisher and subscriber using Python on AWS IoT Core. This guide demonstrates setting up secure, bi-directional communication between a Raspberry Pi device and a web server leveraging AWS IoT Core and the AWS IoT Device SDK. Perfect for turning your Pi into a full-fledged IoT client with real-time message exchange.
